text: <@UHWC9PXBL> I really appreciate your words. We have a YouTube channel with some videos. We are currently working on more in depth demonstration videos but these should give you an idea. <https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr56hZF1AH8oTflqC0Yyolg|https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCr56hZF1AH8oTflqC0Yyolg>

attachments.title: RendezView
attachments.text: Enjoy the videos and music you love, upload original content, and share it all with friends, family, and the world on YouTube.

elements.text: I really appreciate your words. We have a YouTube channel with some videos. We are currently working on more in depth demonstration videos but these should give you an idea.

text: <@UJ6LDMMN0> Exactly Nicolas!  The workspaces are synchronized to be used synchronously or asynchronously with your teams. Hope you can get a chance to try it with them! you can organize your meetings before they happen and recurrent meetings are a bliss since the documents are always there.

elements.text: Exactly Nicolas!  The workspaces are synchronized to be used synchronously or asynchronously with your teams. Hope you can get a chance to try it with them! you can organize your meetings before they happen and recurrent meetings are a bliss since the documents are always there.

text:
We are building a startup along these lines though is not exactly a white-boarding app. The platform allows to video conference and work on multiple documents like sheets, documents and slides in the same synchronized shared space. We have our free beta live if you want feel free to take a look here: <http://www.rendezview.io|www.rendezview.io> I would really appreciate any of your feedback. thanks! 

(Reposted, before was posted in top channel not in thread)
